Package broker

Contains all the logic for the game

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Board
    This class represents an Object of Type Board and contains and maintains the state of the current game being played.
    Game
    This class represents a single round instance for the game.
    Piece
    This class represent an object of type Piece which will contain the necessary data for each piece that will be played by either player.
    Player
    This class represents an object of type Player which will contain and maintain all the relevant player profile info, such as name, piece colour, and the number of wins, losses, and draws the player has.
    Square
    This class represents an Object of type square which will contain and maintain all the necessary information for each square on the board.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    IllegalMove
    This exception is to be thrown when there was an attempt by any player to place a piece on a square that is already occupied.
    WinAndLosses
    This exception stores who the winning and losing player are in a single round

Package broker Description

Contains all the logic for the game
